title: Lamb tagine with quince
ingredients: ['750g leg of lamb, cubed', '2 large onions, finely grated', '60g butter', '1/2 teaspoon ground ginger', '1 teaspoon freshly ground black pepper', '1/2 teaspoon saffron threads', '1 cinnamon stick', '600ml water', 'salt', '2 large quince', '2 teaspoons honey', '1/2 teaspoon cinnamon']
